# ERK

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

ERK includes functions related to LiDAR, the Helios model, etc. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of ERK from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("erkent/ERK")
```
